numberOfTestcases = int(raw_input())
for i in range(0, numberOfTestcases):
	number = raw_input()
	array = [int(x) for x in raw_input().split()]
	array.sort()
	bucket = []
	for t in range(0, 10000):
		bucket.append(0)
	for each in array:
		bucket[each-1]+=1
	maxcount = 0
	for t in range(0, 10000):
		if bucket[t]>maxcount:
			maxcount = bucket[t]
			value = t+1
	print value, maxcount
